articles.description: The play-off chasing Pilgrims have their final League One game of the regular season on Saturday lunchtime
articles.content:
Plymouth Argyle captain Joe Edwards could be available for the crucial League One encounter against MK Dons at Home Park on Saturday lunchtime.

articles.title: Zak Hardaker rushed to hospital after suffering a seizure while on walk - Leeds Live
articles.description: The new Leeds Rhinos signing will miss Friday's game against Hull KR, which was due to be his second debut.
articles.content: Zak Hardaker was rushed to hospital after suffering a suspected seizure while out on a walk with his young son. The incident took place on Tuesday afternoon, shortly after he had reported to his firs… [+1612 chars]
